other_tests.findings: CD4 cell count was reported as 45 cells/mL, up from a nadir of 7 cells/mL.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Subsequently increased to 121 cells/mL after improved adherence to antiretroviral therapy.

other_tests.findings: Polymorphous lymphoid infiltrate with normal architecture; EBV-related lymphoid hyperplasia confirmed.
Initial serum EBV load was 1700 copies/mL.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Became undetectable two months after starting antiretroviral therapy.

other_tests.date: Initial CT scan: Not specified; Follow-up CT scan: 8 months after initial scan
other_tests.findings: Initial CT showed bilateral axillary lymphadenopathy and other lymph node enlargements; follow-up CT showed significant shrinkage of the lymphadenopathy.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Significant shrinkage of lymphadenopathy observed on follow-up examination.
